name: Infinity Search
description:
The universe is becoming too overpopulated! 

Journey across a desert beachland as Shmanos, the purple heavyweight (who DEFINITLELY does not look like the blockbuster villain) on a mission to gather the 6 Infinity Gems and cut the population of the universe in half. But unlike his blockbuster brother, Shmanos on his own is defenseless, and must gather items in order to defeat the Kwab Guardians protecting the stones. 

But Shmanos has a problem. An ancient curse dictates that when and item is used up, the space it inhabits vanishes! Inventory slots will vanish whenever a slot is vacated, requiring Shmanos to choose judiciously on how to use his many items.

Controls:
  • W/A/S/D: Move
  • 1-9: Select Slot
  • Z: Use selected item
  • X + Mouse Hover: Pick up item
